name: Street Rat
description:
English: A project im currently working on, inspired by games like Thief: The Dark Project. Take the role of a thief (forcefully) working for the misterious Thief Guild, as he tries to steal a powerful artifact.

Español: Un projecto en el que estoy trabajando actualmente, inspirado en Thief: The Dark Project. Toma el rol de un ladrón que tabaja (forzosamente) para el Gremio de ladrones, quien debe robar un poderoso artefacto.
